root.name: Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre
root.description: OverviewThis game is the successor of Foreign Legion Bucket of Blood and continues the multi-player cartoonisch shooter gameplay of the previous version.PC System RequirementsRecommended:OS:Windows XP or laterProcessor:2.2 GHz or faster, multi-coreMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:Dedicated graphics card, 512 VRAMDirectXÂ®:9.0cHard Drive:400 MB HD spaceOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connectionMac System RequirementsRecommended:OS:Mac OS X 10.6 or later
